body: Sophia Azeb asks, "Where does Africa end and the Middle East begin?": "Yes – this so-called ‘Arab world’ has its own sets of racial hierarchies. Absolutely. Many in North Africa would bristle at being called African, much less black. And certainly–the treatment of migrant laborers in North Africa and Southwest Asia (from all parts of Asia and Africa) is just as dire as in Europe and North America."
original_body: Sophia Azeb asks, "Where does Africa end and the Middle East begin?": "Yes – this so-called ‘Arab world’ has its own sets of racial hierarchies. Absolutely. Many in North Africa would bristle at being called African, much less black. And certainly–the treatment of migrant laborers in North Africa and Southwest Asia (from all parts of Asia and Africa) is just as dire as in Europe and North America."
title: Africa/Middle East: Where does Africa end and the Middle East begin?
